aiida_supercon.tools.calculators module

Calculators for the superconductivity analysis.

aiida_supercon.tools.calculators.allen_dynes(lambo, omega_log, mu_star)[source]

Calculate the Allen-Dynes critical temperature Tc.

aiida_supercon.tools.calculators.calculate_lambda_omega(frequency: _SupportsArray[dtype[Any]] | _NestedSequence[_SupportsArray[dtype[Any]]] | bool | int | float | complex | str | bytes | _NestedSequence[bool | int | float | complex | str | bytes], spectrum: _SupportsArray[dtype[Any]] | _NestedSequence[_SupportsArray[dtype[Any]]] | bool | int | float | complex | str | bytes | _NestedSequence[bool | int | float | complex | str | bytes]) → tuple[source]

Calculate lambda and omega_log from the parsed a2F spectrum.

Parameters:

  • frequency – Frequency array on which the a2F spectrum is defined [meV].

  • spectrum – a2F spectral function values.

Returns:

Tuple of the calculated lambda and omega_log values.

aiida_supercon.tools.plot module

Temporary home for various plotting tools.

aiida_supercon.tools.plot.check_wannier_bands(w90_bands_workchain, bands_workchain_qe, filename=None)[source]
aiida_supercon.tools.plot.check_wannier_optimize(w90_optimize_workchain, filename=None)[source]
aiida_supercon.tools.plot.create_xticks(seekpath_params)[source]

Create xticks and xtick_labels for a band structure plot from the Seek-path parameters.

aiida_supercon.tools.plot.create_xticks_bands(bands: BandsData) → Tuple[list, list][source]

Create xticks and xtick_labels for a band structure plot.

Takes a BandsData object and returns a tuple of xticks and xtick_labels. The script takes care of two things:

  1. If the last label of a segment is not the same as the first label of the next segment, a vertical line is added between the two symmetry point labels.

  2. In case the label is “GAMMA”, it is replaced with the greek capital letter gamma, as is the convention.

aiida_supercon.tools.plot.find_clusters(temps, delta_nk, threshold)[source]

Find the clusters of temperatures where the gap is above a certain threshold
